QuestData.Title: Tazavesh: Raiders of the Lost Artifact
QuestData.Description:
It looks like you may need to show a bit of force once more, my dear friend. Tazavesh security will not let us simply walk in.
But So'leah needs to be stopped. If that requires a bit of physical... persuasion... then it is a necessary evil.
Bring some friends. I have a feeling the security here has tricks up their sleeves.
QuestData.RewardText: <So'leah has been defeated. Now, for the artifact she was using...>
